theSorcerer:BaptismOfFire.NAME: Baptism of Fire
theSorcerer:BaptismOfFire.DESCRIPTION: Metamorphose a card to become thesorcerer:Fire for the rest of combat.

theSorcerer:ColdShower.NAME: Cold Shower
theSorcerer:ColdShower.DESCRIPTION: Metamorphose a card to become thesorcerer:Ice for the rest of combat.

theSorcerer:Tradeoff.NAME: Tradeoff
theSorcerer:Tradeoff.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Choose 1 card. Increase that cards cost by !theSorcerer:M2!. NL Gain [E].

theSorcerer:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theSorcerer:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theSorcerer:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theSorcerer:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theSorcerer:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theSorcerer:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theSorcerer:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theSorcerer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theSorcerer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theSorcerer:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theSorcerer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theSorcerer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theSorcerer:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
